mil6.3.2:11.3_0: “In the same way, great king, the being intent on awakening—in a hundred thousand eons of the world—with its gods, Māras and Brahmās, and Brahmās—who is transformed by the Buddha, the champion, and the six classes of rebirth, old age, and death—be they will be the wheel-turning monarch?”
